entry.title: Wednesday: Sunny. High minus 22.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 22. Wind chill minus 41 this morning and minus 29 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 19 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning late this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 19 by morning. Wind chill minus 33 this evening and minus 26 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High minus 18 with temperature falling to minus 24 in the afternoon.
